name: Ultimate Discord: Infinity
description:
ULTIMATE DISCORD: INFINITY

Hi!

I made this game in 5 hours, so expect bugs and weirdness!

The game is simple; you're a ghost who just wants to listen to music, but music-eating drones from space are attacking you! Time to fight back with GHOST MAGIC!

The game plays like an arcade-style twin-stick shooter.

You have a health score at the top of the screen - shoot the drones to steal your music back, and try to survive for as long as you can!

You have 3 bombs - bombs unleash a bunch of missiles at the robots, although they behave erratically. You can get more bombs by scoring tons of points!

This game is playable both with a keyboard and with any XInput-compatible controller. No Mac or Linux builds, I made this in a very short time!

CREDITS

-------

Uses the Otter2D C# Framework by Kyle Pulver.

Music:

Goodbye Summer, Hello Winter by FantomenK

Font:

KenPixel Blocks

All other assets are my own.

This game is being released for free, with no commercial profit to be made. Do not resell.
